text_logic_form: The triangles $BCD$ and $WXY$ are congruent to each other.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangles $BCD$ and $WXY$ are congruent to each other.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CB$ is $11$.
The measure of angle $BCD$ is $20x-4$ degrees.
The length of the line $XW$ is $2x+5$.
The measure of angle $CBD$ is $24x+5$ degrees.
The measure of angle $XWY$ is $77$ degrees.
line_instances: There are lines $BC$, $BD$, and $CD$, forming a triangle $BCD$.
There are lines $WX$, $WY$, and $YX$, forming a triangle $WXY$.
